Package item

Class ColourKey

java.lang.Object
item.Item
item.ColourKey
public class ColourKey extends Item
The ColourKey class represents a colored key item in a game. This class extends the Item class and includes a specific color attribute, making it distinct and potentially corresponding to specific doors or obstacles.

      x - The x-coordinate of the color key.
      y - The y-coordinate of the color key.
      pickedUp - Indicates whether the color key has been picked up.

  • Method Details

    • pickUp

      public void pickUp()
      Marks the color key as picked up and updates its key. This method changes the key's state to reflect that it has been collected.
      Overrides:
      pickUp in class Item

    • getColour

      public Color getColour()
      Retrieves the color of the key. This method is used to get the specific color associated with this key, which can be indicative of its purpose or the specific lock it opens.
      Returns:
      The Color of the key.

    • setColour

      public void setColour(Color colour)
      Sets the color of the key. This method allows changing the color of the key, potentially altering its corresponding lock or usage within the game.
      Parameters:
      colour - The new Color to be set for the key.
